@Version(value="4.2.0")

Package com.cognifide.slice.mapper.annotation

  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    MappingStrategy
    Defines what fields of classes annotated by SliceResource are mapped by Mapper
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    Children
    Allows mapper to map all child resources of a parent resource into array or list.
    Follow
    Allows mapper to map a resource by following a path stored under given jcr property.
    IgnoreProperty
    Indicates that a SliceResource's field should not be mapped by Mapper.
    ImagePath
    Indicates that a SliceResource's field represents an image resource.
    JcrProperty
    Allows mapper a resource stored under given jcr property.
    SliceReference
    Allows for injection of models from a different location (path) than a current processing path.
    SliceResource
    Objects marked with this annotation can be adapted from Resource.
    Unescaped
    By default each text property will have HTML entities escaped; this annotation indicates the escaping should not be done (e.g.
